summary: Kira is A standalone follower that i made for the first time! :) please give me a suggestion and or a endorsement if i did an amazing work! thanks. :)
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://s30.postimg.org/jhzz4i269/kira.png[/img]
Hi my name is Arxizus and this is my first time making a follower mod so a suggestion or a endorsement would appreciated. :)


Kira is a standalone follower so i don't think it requires anything.

[b]Some information about information about Kira.
[/b]
[b]Heigt: [/b]1
---------------------
[b]Weight: 0.46
---------------------
Location: [/b]The Bannered Mare
---------------------
[b]Weapon: She is  a fire mage so she use spells.[/b]
---------------------[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79127/?][size=5]
[/size][/url]

[size=6]
[CHANGELOG]
[/size]7/2/2017 - 10:24PM : I decided to remake kira to have a new look and skills she is now a fire mage.

16/01/2017 - 05:29PM:She is now a mage of destruction her spells are fireball and chain lightning, if someone knows how to make her face looks happy  and not sad please PM me right away thanks. :)
author: Arxizus
